entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
